channel.title: Need help with cleaning/old bugs
channel.description:
This looks like the best place to post it, so,
I'm sure there are some people here who are familiar with old bugs that were around before all the children came to this site. I've made a pretty good scripting system for an old version of winterlove's server, but I need help from someone who knows the structure of the server, because I'm not familiar with it and I was hoping someone who is wouldn't mind cleaning up any obvious dirty stuff, and fixing any old bugs.
I'd do it myself, and I'm pretty sure that's how it will end up happening.
I'll attach what I have so far, any optimizations/contributions would be rovery.
PS: dont give this to moparscapers
tl;dr: help me clean this thing

item.title: Need help with cleaning/old bugs
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

go take a look at it, their method to the madness is well. madness.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with cleaning/old bugs
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

item spawns need to be completely redone, as they are now when you get a drop and logout and or walk away the item dissapears and does not respawn for you.

Read full topic
